entry.title: Combined summary - snailmail bitcoin client
entry.summary: The potential business idea mentioned is to provide a service where customers can send bitcoin transactions printed on paper. These transactions would then be scanned and broadcasted to the network for a fee, which could be either a minimum amount or 0.01% of the transaction value. The payment for this service could also be sent as another paper transaction or in cash.In addition to this main service, there is an expansion possibility where the service could offer a snail mail-based email or publishing platform. This platform would enable customers to send letters that are made available in various forms including a single webpage, via email, or in a data dump with all open letters received within a certain time frame.Overall, the business idea revolves around providing a convenient and accessible way for people to transact using bitcoin without the need for an internet connection. The idea could potentially appeal to individuals who may not have access to reliable internet connections but still want to participate in the cryptocurrency market.
